knimeNode.name: Scorer (deprecated)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is obsolete! Please use the new Scorer node located in the Mining -> Scoring category.

fullDescription.intro:
This node is obsolete! Please use the new Scorer node located in the Mining -> Scoring category.
Compares two columns by their attribute value pairs and shows the confusion matrix, i.e. how many rows of which attribute and their classification. The dialog allows you to select two columns to compare; the values from the first selected column are represented in the confusion matrix's rows and the values from the second column by the confusion matrix's columns. The output of the node is the confusion matrix.

ports.inPort: Table containing at least two columns to compare.

views.view: Displays the confusion matrix in a table view.
